root.name: Root User
root.description: Root is the most elevated role of users. This type of user can do everything in the system.

system_administrator.name: System Administrator
system_administrator.description: The System Administrator has the full power about the system, but can't do some things Root User can do.

users_manager.name: User Manager
users_manager.description: User Manager has the permission to add, edit permissions or remove users from the system.
